original_text: But the priest answered David, “I don’t have any ordinary bread on hand; however, there is some consecrated bread here—provided the men have kept themselves from women.”
korean_text: 제사장이 다윗에게 대답하여 이르되 보통 떡은 내 수중에 없으나 거룩한 떡은 있나니 그 소년들이 여자를 가까이만 하지 아니하였으면 주리라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: I don't have any ordinary bread on hand
however, there is some consecrated bread here
provided the men have kept themselves from women
